topic.title: How to Add Support for a New Language (DITA and CSS)

body.p: For the DITA Map PDF - based on DITA & CSS - WYSIWYG transformation type, the built-in CSS rules are in two directories. For example, the French translation is in:

ol.li: Copy and then rename the English translation files next to your customization CSS.-i18n-en.css -> -i18n-nl.css p-i18n-en.css -> p-i18n-nl.css
Reference these two files from your customization CSS.
